tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE special_events (
  event_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  event_date DATE,
  event_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE promotions (
    promotion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    promotion_type VARCHAR(100),
    promotion_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE event_guests (
    guest_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    guest_name VARCHAR(100),
    guest_email VARCHAR(255),
    CONSTRAINT fk_event_id FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES special_events(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE promotion_customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    promotion_id INT,
    customer_name VARCHAR(100),
    customer_email VARCHAR(255),
    CONSTRAINT fk_promotion_id FOREIGN KEY (promotion_id) REFERENCES promotions(promotion_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Promotions (
    promotion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    promotion_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    discount DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE EventAttendees (
    event_id INT,
    attendee_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (event_id, attendee_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES Events(event_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (attendee_id) REFERENCES Customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Reservations (
    reservation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    reservation_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES Events(event_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customers(customer_id)
);
